# Gene set enrichment

## OR vs R

```{r}
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["R_vs_OR"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
```


## OR vs R no RUNX1m

```{r}

# dev.off()
```



## NR vs R
